review: Works well most of the time, but when running for longer periods, service does falter slightly (just takes a reset). Additionally, most apps (Netflix, HBOGO, Hulu, etc) haven't quite figured out autoplay just yet, so when operating from a smartphone, you have to manually start each show. Otherwise, great product.
